name: dbplus_getunique
purpose: Get an id number unique to a relation

return.description:
Returns DBPLUS_ERR_NOERR on success or a db++ error
   code on failure.

notes.description:
This function is
EXPERIMENTAL. The behaviour of this function, its name, and
surrounding documentation may change without notice in a future release of PHP.
This function should be used at your own risk.
